Name: Apples 'n' Pears
Ingredients: 45 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
22.5 ml Belle de Brillet pear liqueur
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of apple or pear slice, fresh or dehydrated.
Garnish with apple or pear slice, fresh/dehydrated, floated or on the rim.
Review: In cockney rhyming slang 'apples and pears' means 'stairs'. The flavours of the fruits also combine well, here fortified with calvados.
History: Created in 2005 by yours truly in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Apples 'n' Pears contains 179 calories
